product.uniqueVintageMessage: All vintage pieces are unique and once sold, cannot be restocked.
product.care1: Dry clean or hand wash in cold water with gentle detergent
product.care2: Lay flat to dry or hang on padded hangers
product.care3: Avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading
product.care4: Steam instead of iron when possible
product.care5: Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture
product.vinylCare1: Handle records by the edges and label area only
product.vinylCare2: Clean with a carbon fiber brush before each play
product.vinylCare3: Store vertically in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
product.vinylCare4: Keep records in their sleeves when not in use
product.vinylCare5: Avoid stacking records horizontally to prevent warping
product.furnitureCare1: Dust regularly with a soft, dry cloth
product.furnitureCare2: Avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading and wood damage
product.furnitureCare3: Keep away from heat sources and maintain stable humidity
product.furnitureCare4: Use coasters and placemats to protect surfaces
product.jewelryCare1: Store in a soft pouch or jewelry box to prevent scratches
product.jewelryCare2: Avoid contact with water, perfumes, and harsh chemicals
product.jewelryCare3: Clean gently with a soft, dry cloth
product.jewelryCare4: Remove before swimming, showering, or exercising
product.genericCare1: Handle with care to preserve its vintage character
product.genericCare2: Keep in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
product.genericCare3: Avoid exposure to extreme temperatures and humidity
product.returnIntro: We want you to love your vintage find! Returns are accepted within 7 days of delivery.
product.return1: Item must be unworn and in original condition
product.return2: Return shipping is the responsibility of the buyer
product.return3: Refund will be issued within 5-7 business days

hero.title: Vintage Items Curated With Care
hero.subtitle: Discover authentic vintage pieces from the 1950s-2000s. Each item is one-of-a-kind with its own character and history.

taxPolicy.notice: As second-hand goods, this purchase may be tax-exempt in your region.
taxPolicy.learnMore: Learn more about our tax policy
taxPolicy.title: Tax Policy for Second-Hand Vintage Goods
taxPolicy.subtitle: Understanding tax treatment for vintage and second-hand items
taxPolicy.disclaimer: This is general information only and does not constitute tax or legal advice. Please consult with qualified tax professionals regarding your specific situation.
taxPolicy.overviewIntro: Tax laws vary significantly by jurisdiction. This policy outlines how we handle tax for second-hand vintage goods sold through our platform.
taxPolicy.overviewExplanation: In most jurisdictions, second-hand goods are exempt from standard sales tax/VAT when sold by individuals or under special margin schemes, as the tax was already paid when the item was originally purchased new.
taxPolicy.currentPolicyHighlight: All sales on this platform are processed with $0.00 tax.
taxPolicy.currentPolicyRationale: This reflects the tax-exempt status of genuine second-hand goods in most jurisdictions:
taxPolicy.rationalePoint1: All items sold are genuine second-hand/vintage goods
taxPolicy.rationalePoint2: Items are personal property being resold
taxPolicy.rationalePoint3: Most jurisdictions exempt such sales from standard sales tax/VAT
taxPolicy.rationalePoint4: Compliant with margin scheme principles where applicable
taxPolicy.customerResponsibilitiesIntro: While we do not collect tax on these transactions, customers may have obligations in their jurisdiction:
taxPolicy.useTaxDescription: Some jurisdictions require buyers to self-report and pay use tax on purchases.
taxPolicy.importDutiesDescription: International buyers may owe customs duties and VAT/GST when goods enter their country.
taxPolicy.recordKeepingDescription: Keep purchase receipts for your tax records and potential future resale.
taxPolicy.professionalAdviceDescription: Consult a tax professional if you're uncertain about your tax obligations.
taxPolicy.regionalInfoIntro: Here's a brief overview of tax treatment by region. For detailed information, see our full documentation.
taxPolicy.usDescription: Most states exempt used goods from sales tax. Tax was already paid on the original purchase.
taxPolicy.euDescription: Second-hand goods qualify for the VAT Margin Scheme, where VAT is only charged on the profit margin.
taxPolicy.ukDescription: VAT Margin Scheme applies to second-hand goods. No VAT on exports with proper documentation.
taxPolicy.canadaDescription: GST/HST generally does not apply when individuals sell used personal property.
taxPolicy.australiaDescription: GST may not apply to second-hand goods under the margin scheme, depending on your business status.
taxPolicy.japanDescription: Special consumption tax rules apply for used goods. Business threshold is ¥10 million in annual sales.
taxPolicy.questionsIntro: Consult with a qualified tax professional if:
taxPolicy.questionItem1: Your annual sales exceed thresholds in your jurisdiction
taxPolicy.questionItem3: You've received a tax audit notice
taxPolicy.questionItem4: Laws have recently changed in your area
taxPolicy.documentationDescription: For complete details including specific tax rules by jurisdiction, compliance requirements, and record-keeping guidelines, please refer to our full tax policy documentation.

orderConfirmation.subject: Order Confirmation - {orderNumber}
orderConfirmation.preview: Order {orderNumber} confirmed - Thank you for your purchase!
orderConfirmation.heading: Thank You for Your Order!
orderConfirmation.intro: We've received your order and are excited to get your vintage items to you! Your order confirmation number is:
orderConfirmation.step1Text: Each vintage item is carefully inspected and packaged.
orderConfirmation.step2Text: We'll send you an email with tracking information once your order ships.
orderConfirmation.step3Text: Your vintage treasures should arrive within 5-7 business days.
orderConfirmation.supportText: Questions about your order? We're here to help!

shippingNotification.subject: Your Order Has Shipped - {orderNumber}
shippingNotification.heading: Your Order is On Its Way!
shippingNotification.intro: Great news! Your vintage items have been shipped and are heading your way.
shippingNotification.tip1: Track your package: Use the tracking number above to monitor your delivery status.
shippingNotification.tip2: Be available: A signature may be required upon delivery.
shippingNotification.tip3: Inspect your items: Check your vintage items carefully upon arrival.
shippingNotification.thankYou: Thank you for choosing Dream Azul!

deliveryConfirmation.subject: Order Delivered - {orderNumber}
deliveryConfirmation.heading: Your Order Has Been Delivered!
deliveryConfirmation.intro: We're excited to confirm that your vintage items have been delivered to your address. We hope you love them!
deliveryConfirmation.feedbackText: We'd love to hear about your experience! Your feedback helps us improve and discover new vintage treasures.
deliveryConfirmation.supportText: Questions or concerns about your order?
deliveryConfirmation.thankYou: Thank you for supporting vintage fashion!

cancellationEmail.subject: Order Cancelled - {orderNumber}
cancellationEmail.heading: Order Cancelled
cancellationEmail.intro: This email confirms that your order has been cancelled and a full refund has been processed.
cancellationEmail.refundText: A full refund has been processed to your original payment method.
cancellationEmail.refundNote: Please allow 5-7 business days for the refund to appear in your account.
cancellationEmail.continueShoppingText: We're sorry this order didn't work out. We hope you'll find another vintage treasure you love!
cancellationEmail.supportText: Questions about your cancellation or refund?

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or deleted.

shipping.pageDescription: We ship authentic vintage items worldwide. Review our shipping zones, rates, and estimated delivery times below.
shipping.estimatedRatesText: The rates shown below are estimates. Actual shipping costs will be calculated at checkout based on your destination, package weight, and dimensions.
shipping.processingTimeText: Orders are typically processed and shipped within 2-3 business days. You will receive an email notification with tracking information once your order ships.
shipping.trackingInfoText: All shipments include tracking. Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this to monitor your package's journey.
shipping.deliveryTimesText: Estimated delivery times begin from the ship date, not the order date. Delays may occur due to customs clearance for international shipments or during peak holiday periods.
shipping.customsImportantText: International customers are responsible for any customs duties, taxes, or fees imposed by their country. These charges are not included in our shipping rates and vary by destination.
shipping.vintageAdvantageText: Our items are authentic vintage and second-hand goods. Many countries offer reduced or exempt customs duties for used items. All shipments are clearly marked as "Used Vintage Goods" to help facilitate customs clearance.
shipping.customsPoint1: All items declared as used/vintage goods
shipping.customsPoint2: HS Code: Varies by product category
shipping.customsPoint4: Origin: Varies by vintage item sourcing
shipping.euText: VAT exempt for second-hand goods under margin scheme in many EU countries
shipping.otherRegionsText: Customs duties vary by country and item value. We recommend checking with your local customs office for specific rates. As vintage/used goods, our items often qualify for reduced rates.
shipping.restrictionsIntro: While we strive to ship worldwide, some restrictions may apply:
shipping.restrictionPoint1: Some countries restrict or prohibit imports of certain second-hand items for health or economic reasons
shipping.restrictionPoint2: Certain remote or sanctioned regions may not be serviceable
shipping.restrictionPoint3: Additional shipping charges may apply for islands or remote territories
shipping.restrictionsNote: If you're unsure whether we can ship to your location, please contact us before placing your order.
shipping.lostPackagesText: If your package appears lost in transit, please contact us immediately. We will work with the shipping carrier to locate your package. After a reasonable investigation period, we may issue a refund or replacement.
shipping.damagedItemsText: If your item arrives damaged, please contact us within 48 hours with photos of the damage and packaging. We will arrange for a replacement or refund as appropriate.
shipping.incorrectAddressText: Please ensure your shipping address is correct at checkout. We cannot be responsible for packages shipped to incorrect addresses provided by the customer. Address changes after shipment may incur additional fees.
shipping.contactFooter: Have questions about shipping? Contact us and we'll be happy to help!
